function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Routine disinfection timeframes not being followed for contacted surfaces and items","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for routine disinfection and cleaning schedules","Technologies":"Use of automated cleaning robots and UVGI cleaners","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Higher occupant density leading to increased physical contact and exposure to shared air","Impact":"Higher infection probability and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement space and occupancy management techniques to control density and facilitate social distancing","Technologies":"Adoption of BIM and IoT-based applications for space occupancy tracking and visualization","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of touchless operation technology for common office items and facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of surface contact transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Implementation of IoT-equipped systems for touchless operation of office items and facilities","Technologies":"IoT-based touchless operation systems","People":"Office users, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
